author: jersday
body:
If you’re not able to pull this information up like literally be able to google how to do this how on earth do you think you’ll have the stamina fortitude or savvy to be successful with options. 

I understand you need to start somewhere but this ideology here of “tel me how to do it and where to find out how to do it” just highlights why regular people with zero finance background lose it all.

author: Comprehensive_Bad650
body: HODL!! HODL! And call your representatives & senators & tell them to pass both Infrastructure & Reconciliation. They do listen to their voicemails. For Senator tel #: https://www.senate.gov/senators/senators-contact.htm for Representative tel #: https://www.house.gov/representatives/find-your-representative

author: Elster-
body: Not cash but a friend of mine is 100% in bonds at the moment. He sold everything last February and put into bonds. Great idea for the dip, however if you are constantly waiting for the next dip before investing or wait for the bottom it will already be higher than what you cashed out at. He needs a 25% drop minimum to get back to where he was. He is still predicting a 50% drop. Time will tel
